title: Blue Owl’s Woes Expose Private Credit Risks for Retail Investors
description: For years, private credit funds trumpeted a key distinction from other corners of finance: insulation from liquidity mismatches.
content: For years, private credit funds trumpeted a key distinction from other corners of finance: insulation from liquidity mismatches.
